text: Tapā'ī bhanidinus ki ma timīsita yō bhandina ki masam̐ga allāhakō ḍhukuṭī cha ra nata ma antaryāmī hūm̐, ra nata ma yō bhandachu ki ma phariśtā hūm̐ . Ma ta mātra tī ādēśaharūkō pālanā gardachu juna malā'ī allāhakō tarphabāṭa prāpta huncha. Tapā'ī bhannus ki kē andhā ra ām̐khā dēkhnē ēkanāsa hunasakchara? Ani timī vicāra kina puryā'um̐dainauṁ
